it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.match

Class MatchConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.match.MatchConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class MatchConfiguration
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represent the configuration needed to create a new match. This includes:
    • the board to be used
    • the number of skulls on the killshot track
    Mind that the characters are randomly assigned to the players
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • MatchConfiguration

        public MatchConfiguration()
        Creates an empty match configuration

      • MatchConfiguration

        public MatchConfiguration(int boardId,
                          int skulls)
        Creates a match configuration with given parameters
        Parameters:
        boardId - id of the board to play on
        skulls - number of skulls to be put on the killshot track
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if playerColors contains duplicate values or skulls
        NullPointerException - if null arguments are provided
